text: Fair Enough is a 1918 American silent comedy film directed by Edward Sloman and starring Margarita Fischer, Eugenie Forde, and Alfred Hollingsworth.Katchmer p. 509 ==Cast== * Margarita Fischer as Ann Dickson * Eugenie Forde as Mrs. Ellen Dickson * Alfred Hollingsworth as James Dickson Esq. * Alice Knowland as Madame Ohnet * Harry McCoy as Frederick Pierson * Jack Mower as Carey Phelan * Bull Montana as 'Happy' Flanigan * J. Farrell MacDonald as Chief of Police Morgan ==References== ==Bibliography== * George A. Katchmer. Eighty Silent Film Stars: Biographies and Filmographies of the Obscure to the Well Known. McFarland, 1991. ==External links== * * Category:1918 films Category:1918 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Films directed by Edward Sloman Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Pathé Exchange films
title: Fair Enough
